whyChoose.title: Why Choose RESPIRA+
whyChoose.subtitle: Discover what makes RESPIRA+ the perfect choice for a pure, refreshing experience

descriptions.noNicotine: Enjoy a pure experience without harmful substances. Our products contain zero nicotine and tar, making them completely non-addictive.
descriptions.natural: Made from carefully selected natural herbs and plants. Pure, organic ingredients for the ultimate refreshing experience.
descriptions.portable: Compact, lightweight design that fits perfectly in your pocket. Easy to use with a sleek, modern aesthetic.
descriptions.safe: Tested for safety and purity. Experience a clean, refreshing sensation that invigorates your senses naturally.

whyChoose.cta: Join thousands of satisfied customers who have made the switch to RESPIRA+

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Discover the story behind RESPIRA+ and our commitment to combining technology with nature

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At RESPIRA+, we believe in combining the power of technology with the purity of natural extracts to create revolutionary breathing experiences. Our mission is to provide safe, effective, and enjoyable alternatives that enhance your daily life while maintaining the highest standards of quality and safety.

technology.title: Advanced Technology
technology.subtitle: Innovation Meets Nature
technology.description: We combine cutting-edge technology with natural extracts to create the perfect breathing experience. Our advanced systems ensure consistent quality and purity in every product.

extraction.title: Cold Extraction
extraction.subtitle: Purity & Safety Guaranteed
extraction.description: Our proprietary cold extraction method preserves the natural compounds and ensures maximum purity. This gentle process maintains the integrity of our herbal extracts without compromising safety.

natural.title: Natural Extracts
natural.subtitle: Pure & Organic
natural.description: We source the finest natural herbs and plants from trusted suppliers. Every ingredient is carefully selected for its purity and effectiveness in promoting better breathing.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: Constantly pushing boundaries in natural extract technology

purity.title: Purity
purity.description: Maintaining the highest standards of ingredient quality

safety.title: Safety
safety.description: Ensuring every product meets strict safety protocols

about.highlight: Cold Extraction method ensures purity & safety.
about.cta: Join thousands who have discovered the perfect blend of technology and nature with RESPIRA+

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Any question or remark? just write us a message
contact.timezone: All times are in Malaysia Time (GMT+8)

qrVerification.title: Product Verification
qrVerification.subtitle: Verify the authenticity of your RESPIRA+ product using QR code or serial number
qrVerification.formDescription: Enter your product's serial number or scan the QR code to verify authenticity
qrVerification.inputPlaceholder: Enter serial number or scan QR code
qrVerification.scannerInstructions: Point your camera at the QR code to scan

messages.genuine: Congratulations! This is a genuine RESPIRA+ product.
messages.fake: Warning: This product may be counterfeit. Please contact customer support.
messages.cameraNotSupported: Camera access not supported. Please enter the serial number manually.
messages.cameraAccessDenied: Camera access denied. Please allow camera access and try again.
messages.requiresHttps: Camera access requires a secure connection (HTTPS). Please use HTTPS or localhost.
messages.noCamerasFound: No cameras found on this device.
messages.cameraError: An error occurred while accessing the camera.

errors.emptyInput: Please enter a serial number or scan a QR code.

antiCounterfeit.title: Anti-Counterfeit Protection
antiCounterfeit.description: Advanced QR code technology prevents product duplication and ensures authenticity.

secureDatabase.title: Secure Database
secureDatabase.description: All product serial numbers are stored in our secure, encrypted database.

realTime.title: Real-time Verification
realTime.description: Instant verification results with up-to-date product information.
